AMO-Tools-Suite  v.0.3.3
Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

ElectricityReduction.cpp
1 #include <iostream>
2 #include <cmath>
3 #include "calculator/util/ElectricityReduction.h"
4 
5 ElectricityReduction::Output ElectricityReduction::calculate() {
6  double energyUse = 0, energyCost = 0, annualEnergySavings = 0, costSavings = 0, power = 0;
7 
8  // loop through all supplied inputs
9  for (auto & electricityReductionInput: electricityReductionInputVec) {
10  double tmpTotalPower, tmpEnergyUse, tmpEnergyCost, tmpAnnualEnergySavings, tmpCostSavings;
11 
12  //multimeter data
13  if (electricityReductionInput.getMeasurementMethod() == 0) {
14  MultimeterData multimeterData = electricityReductionInput.getMultimeterData();
15  if (multimeterData.getNumberOfPhases() == 1) {
16  tmpTotalPower = multimeterData.getSupplyVoltage() * multimeterData.getAverageCurrent() * multimeterData.getPowerFactor() * 0.001 * electricityReductionInput.getUnits();
17  } else {
18  tmpTotalPower = multimeterData.getSupplyVoltage() * multimeterData.getAverageCurrent() * multimeterData.getPowerFactor() * (sqrt(3) / 1000) * electricityReductionInput.getUnits();
19  }
20  tmpEnergyUse = tmpTotalPower * electricityReductionInput.getOperatingHours();
21  tmpEnergyCost = tmpEnergyUse * electricityReductionInput.getElectricityCost();
22  energyUse = energyUse + tmpEnergyUse;
23  energyCost = energyCost + tmpEnergyCost;
24 
25  // nameplate data
26  } else if (electricityReductionInput.getMeasurementMethod() == 1) {
27  NameplateData nameplateData = electricityReductionInput.getNameplateData();
28  tmpTotalPower = nameplateData.getRatedMotorPower() * nameplateData.getLoadFactor() * pow((nameplateData.getOperationalFrequency() / nameplateData.getLineFrequency()), 2.5) * (1 / nameplateData.getMotorAndDriveEfficiency());
29  tmpEnergyUse = tmpTotalPower * electricityReductionInput.getOperatingHours() * electricityReductionInput.getUnits();
30  tmpEnergyCost = tmpEnergyUse * electricityReductionInput.getElectricityCost();
31  energyUse = energyUse + tmpEnergyUse;
32  energyCost = energyCost + tmpEnergyCost;
33 
34  // power meter data
35  } else if (electricityReductionInput.getMeasurementMethod() == 2) {
36  PowerMeterData powerMeterData = electricityReductionInput.getPowerMeterData();
37  tmpTotalPower = powerMeterData.getPower() * electricityReductionInput.getUnits();
38  tmpEnergyUse = tmpTotalPower * electricityReductionInput.getOperatingHours();
39  tmpEnergyCost = tmpEnergyUse * electricityReductionInput.getElectricityCost();
40  energyUse = energyUse + tmpEnergyUse;
41  energyCost = energyCost + tmpEnergyCost;
42 
43  // other method data
44  } else {
45  OtherMethodData otherMethodData = electricityReductionInput.getOtherMethodData();
46  tmpTotalPower = otherMethodData.getEnergy();
47  tmpEnergyUse = tmpTotalPower;
48  tmpEnergyCost = tmpEnergyUse * electricityReductionInput.getElectricityCost();
49  energyUse = energyUse + tmpEnergyUse;
50  energyCost = energyCost + tmpEnergyCost;
51  }
52  power = power + tmpTotalPower;
53  }
54 
55  // output = Output(energyUse, energyCost, annualEnergySavings, costSavings);
56  return ElectricityReduction::Output(energyUse, energyCost, annualEnergySavings, costSavings, power);
57 }
58 
59 void ElectricityReduction::setElectricityReductionInputVec(std::vector<ElectricityReductionInput> & electricityReductionInput) {
60  this->electricityReductionInputVec = std::move(electricityReductionInputVec);
61 }

78  this->powerFactor = powerFactor;

99 void NameplateData::setMotorAndDriveEfficiency(const double motorAndDriveEfficiency) {
